name: Swing (itch) (ma_jetteleger)
description:
[PROTOTYPE]

Simply follow this black and white entity in its littly dance, or try to lead it around and within various shapes and patterns. Discover hidden and interesting ways for it to makes its way around all parts of a shape.

How to play :

- Click, tap or swipe in the direction you want the entity to move when a path is available, or watch make its own decisions
- Alt-F4 to quit the game (if you downloaded the game on windows)
